articles.title: Norwich City v Cardiff City: David Wagner Championship team news - PinkUn
articles.description: David Wagner previewed Norwich City’s Championship home game against Cardiff City - and we had all the key lines first direct from Colney.
articles.content:
Kieran Dowell has been ruled out since the second part of April after suffering knee ligament damage in the midweek win over Birmingham.
Wagner did confirm Dowell suffered the issue early on taking … [+1365 chars]

articles.title: Six Nations 2023: 'New Byrne-Casey axis under microscope as Farrell tests squad depth' - BBC
articles.description: As Ireland search for a third straight Six Nations win, a new half-back partnership of Ross Byrne and Craig Casey are given a big chance to impress by Andy Farrell.
articles.content:
Farrell has made six changes to the side that beat France
